author: laura.schrettl@kurier.at (Laura Schrettl)
articleContent: Die interaktiven Karten zeigen, wie die Situation aktuell in den Bundesländern aussieht, wie viel getestet wird und wie viele Fälle es bisher in den Bezirken gab.
articleTitleTranslated: Coronavirus: Current infection numbers in Austria
articleContentTranslated: The interactive maps show what the current situation is like in the federal states, how much is being tested and how many cases there have been in the districts so far.
